metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37327 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Integer overflow leading to heap overwrite in FLAC image tag handling

notes.Note: mdeslaur> Two patches are required to fix this CVE. Main patch is in the "good" package, and second patch is in the "base" package.

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-base1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
gst-plugins-good1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
